title: How We Got Here #4: Into The Seventies (Despair in the Me Decade, 70's Films, Hippie Dreams Fail)
description:
How did we get here? I start this discussion off with an extended summary of how we got to the 1970's and the failure of the dreams of the 1960's, before finally settling in to discuss the huge changes in morals, manners and meaning that began in the 1970s.

George Carlin comedy videos can be bought here: https://www.mpihomevideo.com/products/george-carlin-commemorative-collection

And here is my introductory essay at The Anadromous Life. https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/2019/05/11/announcing-the-anadromist/
I could really use some support out here beyond the walls in Tbilisi Georgia. Maybe consider some small monthly contribution through PayPal. Use this PayPal link to help out. 
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG

Check out my other YouTube channel The Anadromous Life: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth research: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above essay site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! Smite like!
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
Swim against the stream my friends. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) Byrne
